channel.title: ♕Dellurium♕-♕CustomRSPS♕-♕GAMBLE♕-♕Daily Updates♕-♕ECONOMY♕-♕25 Skills♕
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/BQFjXU6.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUg23RE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/kgBRh6p.png[/img][/CENTER]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/r42Unhp.png[/img]
Dellurium is a brand new server myself and my partner Pavel decided to start to give people a proper home. We both have been fed up with the way these "popular" servers have been run and have decided to show the community how a real server should be run properly. No community neglect will be ensued, we WILL have daily updates, whether it's content or minor fixes mixed with content. We only focus on the community, and their input because it's their ideas that keep us going in a custom direction. We will not focus solely on donations, nor spend ampule time on Donations, because we both work 40+ hours a week to provide for ourselves and this server. Money is not a necessity, the community being happy is our main goal. We will never consider ourselves better than the next, neither of us consider ourselves God-Coders, we do this as a hobby, and hope to provide the best home for people interested in new paths to an unique server and opportunity. Any coder can create a great server, but it's far more intricate when focusing on how a server should be run properly. __________________________________________________ _____________________________
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/MezU8ZI.png[/img]
[URL=http://dellurium.ipbhost.com/][img]http://i.imgur.com/OhDDy1O.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://dellurium.ipbhost.com/files/file/4-server-download/][img]http://i.imgur.com/XWt81gj.png[/img][/URL][/CENTER]
__________________________________________________ _____________________________
[img]http://i.imgur.com/v9JpdMx.png[/img]
At Dellurium we choose our staff team carefully. We chose people who are not only mature, but not naive. We have an amazing staff team, with a humble community. Our leadership is just as important as our community to us, because we know players lead by example. If people you look up to or listen to act in a certain way, you're more inclined to act in that matter. This is why we choose carefully, and our focus is to have the most humble RSPS community out! We could never go over 30 active members, but I'll take 30 active members that are modest, than to have 1,000 active members whom are a constant problem.
__________________________________________________ _____________________________
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bdORiZB.png[/img]
7 Minigames- *More to come* 14 bosses- Bosses are being added weekly, many custom bosses too *NOT RECOLORS, ACTUAL CUSTOM*. 25*working Skills Weekly Content Polls! Custom Npcs Custom Armour Custom Weapons Donate for your own custom cosmetic! *get it within a week or less* Share your thoughts and ideas with owners who are willing to listen and consider mostly all suggestions. We don't down ideas, in-fact we encourage new ones. Without ideas and creativity our server won't stand out nor strive to be different than others. There are multiple Money Sinks to keep up, but not stump the economy. It's a non-elaborate way of saying we have the Economy under control. Skilling/PVM based- We have decided to solely focus on PVM and Skilling. We have been and will be spending a lot of time on those aspects so that it's endless content. Custom skilling, levels go past 99. NPC kill count shop! Gain points for killing NPCs! Boss points shop! Go bossing and get rewarded for it! Full Slayer, with multi-tasks and a reward shop! Tab-To-Reply Full Screen Clean and neat Forums with the latest IPB updates, many many features other servers don't have. Gamble Zone, with Dicing, Gambling, and a Lottery Humble Community-*Most players are humble and are great to be around,*because we create that sort of environment. We know that what we do reflects our community, so we set a positive example. Dedicated Owners-*We are dedicated to the server and our community!*We all do this as a hobby and we love it; that's why we are different... We love the experience, and to learn new things. Professional Staff Crystal Key chest with an assortment of useful items. Easy, Medium, and Hard clues, custom locations, but proper rewards! Effigies Gem bag-picks up gems for you. Charm Magnet- when wearing, it picks up all charms for you. Bonecrusher- gives exp automatically*when bones are dropped. Elite Slayer helmet, for those who do Slayer on a constant basis! Slayer ring, that takes you to your tasks. Ring of wealth(i) Custom Barrows Minigame Perfect jad mechanics and single wave tzhaar caves Flawless curses and prayers on NPC & Player
__________________________________________________ _____________________________
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/XEfCa91.png[/img]
[SPOILER=Media][img]http://i.imgur.com/IroQKFY.png[/img]
Custom Present NPC:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/60xR0KO.png[/img]
Custom NPCs:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/OzlgcAk.png[/img]
Custom Bosses:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/79mpI3B.png[/img]
Custom Barrows:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ODuQ3Xe.png[/img]
Clean Forums:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Vqphw0b.png[/img]
Constant Updates :
[img]http://i.imgur.com/VUv5086.png[/img]
Proper Bosses:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/wXc2JmI.png[/img][/SPOILER][/CENTER]
Give us a chance to provide you with a humble community, and a server you can call home. Sick of "custom" servers that only recolor? Join us today! I accept constructive criticism.

item.title: ♕Dellurium♕-♕CustomRSPS♕-♕GAMBLE♕-♕Daily Updates♕-♕ECONOMY♕-♕25 Skills♕
item.dc:creator: @Dellurium Dellurium
item.description:
@Dellurium wrote:

RECENT UPDATES:

Fixed Ava’s Accumulator.
Fixed Knife issue.
Forgotten warrior moved to solo zone.
Dung first floor made easier.
Dung 2nd floor made a little easier.
Donator Shop prices reduced HEAVILY to match economy and drop rates.
Dag kings’ health increase.
Colored whips’ stats adjusted, slight advantage over normal whip.
::players re-added
Ice Warriors moved to Frost drag tele at slayer master.
NEW BOSS:
Barebones(Mad Mummy) added fully, he drops Tetsuo, Sea Singer, and Death Lotus, the armour is slightly better than Torva, pernix, and virtus.

Ice Warriors moved to Frost drag tele at slayer master.

DC abuse fixed.

Dungeoneering has been fully revamped. Easier to get rewards with more exp for a better start!

Mage bank and Green drags added to extra teleport at the moment.

Mystery Box in donor shop reduced to 1 point.

Mystery Box drop rate lowered tremendously.

Bandits added properly in bandit camp.

Read full topic

item.title: ♕Dellurium♕-♕CustomRSPS♕-♕GAMBLE♕-♕Daily Updates♕-♕ECONOMY♕-♕25 Skills♕

item.description:

[s]Decent looking customs for higher revision.
Customs i personally haven’t seen before.

Expect me to join. :)[/s]

I just don’t like the pi graphics look, i just can’t handle it.

Read full topic

[CENTER]

bUg23RE.png924×69

[/CENTER]

Dellurium is a brand new server myself and my partner Pavel decided to start to give people a proper home. We both have been fed up with the way these “popular” servers have been run and have decided to show the community how a real server should be run properly. No community neglect will be ensued, we WILL have daily updates, whether it’s content or minor fixes mixed with content. We only focus on the community, and their input because it’s their ideas that keep us going in a custom direction. We will not focus solely on donations, nor spend ampule time on Donations, because we both work 40+ hours a week to provide for ourselves and this server. Money is not a necessity, the community being happy is our main goal. We will never consider ourselves better than the next, neither of us consider ourselves God-Coders, we do this as a hobby, and hope to provide the best home for people interested in new paths to an unique server and opportunity. Any coder can create a great server, but it’s far more intricate when focusing on how a server should be run properly.

[CENTER]

[/CENTER]

At Dellurium we choose our staff team carefully. We chose people who are not only mature, but not naive. We have an amazing staff team, with a humble community. Our leadership is just as important as our community to us, because we know players lead by example. If people you look up to or listen to act in a certain way, you’re more inclined to act in that matter. This is why we choose carefully, and our focus is to have the most humble RSPS community out! We could never go over 30 active members, but I’ll take 30 active members that are modest, than to have 1,000 active members whom are a constant problem.

Share your thoughts and ideas with owners who are willing to listen and consider mostly all suggestions. We don’t down ideas, in-fact we encourage new ones. Without ideas and creativity our server won’t stand out nor strive to be different than others.
There are multiple Money Sinks to keep up, but not stump the economy. It’s a non-elaborate way of saying we have the Economy under control.
Skilling/PVM based- We have decided to solely focus on PVM and Skilling. We have been and will be spending a lot of time on those aspects so that it’s endless content.
Custom skilling, levels go past 99.
NPC kill count shop! Gain points for killing NPCs!
Boss points shop! Go bossing and get rewarded for it!
